history.proof: split. srun best use: @option_ord_res_None, @option_ord_incr_None unfold: Krelation.

exceptions.exn: Cannot coerce UnitalSeparationAlgebra to an evaluable reference.

exceptions.tactic: intros worlds R po_R J H.
intros worlds' R po_R J H.
intros worlds' R' po_R J H.
intros worlds' R' po_R' J H.
intros worlds' R' po_R' J' H.

exceptions.exn: Cannot coerce SeparationAlgebra to an evaluable reference.

original: unfold UnitalSeparationAlgebra. intros worlds R po_R J H. split. - unfold SeparationAlgebra in H. specialize (H worlds J). apply H. - apply Build_UnitalSeparationAlgebra. intros n. destruct (incr_exists n) as [m [residue_incr]]. exists m. split. + apply residue_incr. + apply all_increasing.
